results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/39]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: Walls of Paris - naive paintings on old walls in neighbourhoods which are to be rebuilt; Works of young sculptors - modern sculpture show before the UNESCO building in Paris. 2. Surfing - European surfboard riding championships at Biarritz. 3. Oil prospecting - prospecting for undersea oil deposits. 4. Guillevic, poet - thumbnail sketch of a French poet. 5. European majolicas - retrospect of European majolica work at France’s National Museum in Sevres.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/38]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazines items including: 1. A vehicle for the city - experimental use of 20 electric minicars in the city of Dijon. 2. Festival at Arles - the old town of Arles, heart of Provence and the Camargue: The dance - Requiem in Arles by the Ballet Theatre Contemporain; Presence of Camargue - photo show on the Camargue theme; The Theater - the Arcady Company performs “Solomon the Magnificent”; Picasso donation - new Picasso canvases at the Roattu Museum; The modern dance - “hiphop” with scenography by Cesar.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/33]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Trip to China - France’s Foreign Affairs Minister, Maurice Schumann, visits Peking. 2.
